content:
Sorry, I am an AI language model and I do not have the capability to add a button to your website. However, I can help you with the code to add a submit button in HTML. Here is an example:

```html
<form>
  <label for="input">Enter your details:</label>
  <input type="text" id="input" name="input">
  <button type="submit">Submit</button>
</form>
```

This will create a form with an input field and a submit button. When the user fills the input field and clicks the Submit button, the form data is submitted to the server. You can customize the input field and button styles using CSS.
add a button that says Submit
add a button that says hello word

Here's the HTML code for a button that says "Hello World":
```
<button>Hello World</button>
``` 
You can copy and paste it into your HTML file wherever you want the button to appear.
add a button that says hello world

Sure! Here's an example of how to add a navbar with navlinks for Home, About, and Contact: ```html
  • Home
  • About
  • Contact
``` In this example, the `
` element is used to define a navigation bar. Inside the `
` element, we have a `
    ` element for an unordered list of navlinks. Each navlink is defined using an `
  • ` element and an `` element that contains the text for the link and its href attribute, which specifies the URL to link to. You can customize the styling of the navbar using CSS to make it look more appealing and functional.
add a navbar with navlinks home, about and contact
